code:
classDiagram
  %% ========================================
  %% FEAT-173: Nouvelle hiérarchie IView avec IFunctorView
  %% ========================================
  
  %% Base interfaces
  class IView {
    <<interface>>
    + getType() String
    + instanceOf(IView) boolean
    + isCompatibleWith(IView) boolean
  }
  
  class IFunctorView {
    <<interface>>
    + getMappableView(String) IView
    + getMappableView() IView
    + getSelectorOptions() String[]
    + requiresSelector() boolean
  }
  
  %% State-based views
  class IStateView {
    <<interface>>
    + getFields() Map~String,IField~
    + getField(String) IField
    + hasField(String) boolean
    + getParentView() IView
    + getDeclaredViews() Set~String~
  }
  
  class IPrimitiveView {
    <<interface>>
    + primitive: int, string, bool
  }
  
  class INativeView {
    <<interface>>
    + native types
  }
  
  class INativeStateView {
    <<interface>>
    + native structured
  }
  
  %% Collection views (NOW EXTEND IFunctorView!)
  class ICollectionView {
    <<interface>>
    + collection types
  }
  
  class IListView {
    <<interface>>
    + getElementView() IView
    + [T] notation
  }
  
  class ISetView {
    <<interface>>
    + getElementView() IView
    + Set~T~ notation
  }
  
  class IMapView {
    <<interface>>
    + getKeyView() IView
    + getValueView() IView
    + Map~K,V~ notation
  }
  
  %% Event view (functional types)
  class IEventView {
    <<interface>>
    + getSignature() EventSignature
    + EventExpression support
  }
  
  %% Optional types (FUTURE - FEAT-174)
  class IMaybeView {
    <<interface>>
    + getValueView() IView
    + Maybe~A~ notation
  }
  
  class IEitherView {
    <<interface>>
    + getLeftView() IView
    + getRightView() IView
    + Either~E,A~ notation
  }
  
  %% ========================================
  %% INHERITANCE HIERARCHY
  %% ========================================
  
  %% Base
  IView <|-- IPrimitiveView
  IView <|-- INativeView
  IView <|-- IStateView
  
  %% NEW: IFunctorView as mixin interface
  IView <|-- IFunctorView
  
  %% State hierarchy
  IStateView <|-- INativeStateView
  IStateView <|-- IEventView
  
  %% Collections extend BOTH IStateView AND IFunctorView
  INativeStateView <|-- ICollectionView
  IFunctorView <|.. ICollectionView
  
  ICollectionView <|-- IListView
  ICollectionView <|-- ISetView
  ICollectionView <|-- IMapView
  
  %% Optional types (FUTURE)
  IStateView <|-- IMaybeView
  IFunctorView <|.. IMaybeView
  
  IStateView <|-- IEitherView
  IFunctorView <|.. IEitherView
  
  %% ========================================
  %% NOTES
  %% ========================================
  
  note for IFunctorView "NEW in FEAT-173\nMarker interface for types\nthat support fmap\n(functor map operation)"
  
  note for ICollectionView "NOW implements IFunctorView!\nAll collections are functors:\n- List~T~\n- Set~T~\n- Map~K,V~ (bifunctor)"
  
  note for IMaybeView "FUTURE: FEAT-174\nOptional values\nfmap on Some, ignore None"
  
  note for IEitherView "FUTURE: FEAT-174\nError handling\nfmap on Right, preserve Left"
  
  %% ========================================
  %% STYLING
  %% ========================================
  
  classDef baseInterface fill:#0b3d91,stroke:#081a4a,color:#fff,stroke-width:3px
  classDef functorInterface fill:#28a745,stroke:#1e7e34,color:#fff,stroke-width:3px
  classDef stateInterface fill:#17becf,stroke:#0f6b73,color:#000,stroke-width:2px
  classDef collectionInterface fill:#ffc107,stroke:#ff8800,color:#000,stroke-width:2px
  classDef futureInterface fill:#6c757d,stroke:#495057,color:#fff,stroke-dasharray: 5 5
  
  class IView baseInterface
  class IFunctorView functorInterface
  class IStateView stateInterface
  class ICollectionView collectionInterface
  class IListView collectionInterface
  class ISetView collectionInterface
  class IMapView collectionInterface
  class IMaybeView futureInterface
  class IEitherView futureInterface
